Module it.polimi.ingsw.am52
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am52.settings

Class ApplicationSettings

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am52.settings.ApplicationSettings
public class ApplicationSettings extends Object
The settings for running the application.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private final Optional<ClientSettings>
    clientSettings
    The setting of the application, if it is used as client.
    private final Mode
    mode
    The running mode of the application (Server, or Client).
    private final Optional<ServerSettings>
    serverSettings
    The setting of the application, if it is used as client.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ApplicationSettings(ClientSettings clientSettings)
    Create an object with the specified settings, for running the application in client mode.
    ApplicationSettings(ServerSettings serverSettings)
    Create an object with the specified settings, for running the application in server mode.

  • Method Details

    • getMode

      public Mode getMode()
      Returns:
      The running mode of this application (Server, or Client).

    • getServerSettings

      public ServerSettings getServerSettings()
      Returns:
      The server settings, if the application mode is set to SERVER.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - If the application mode is set to CLIENT.

    • getClientSettings

      public ClientSettings getClientSettings()
      Returns:
      The client settings, if the application mode is set to CLIENT.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - If the application mode is set to SERVER.
